title: LOL Won't Open
body: I've been new to the game and so far, I love it, BUT for some time, it hasn't been letting me open the game because it says that my server stopped responding. I restarted my laptop, and uninstalled and reinstalled the game but it still hasn't worked. If anyone our there knows how to help me, please do. Even though I'm just a newb LOL is a very fun game to me. Thanks!

replies.body:
The server-related errors usually indicate that there is a problem somewhere between your PC and out servers. This is often caused by incompatible network configurations, so I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all of your local settings are good before we investigate further.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.

Sorry it took me some time to reply, I got LOL to work by running it as admin. Everything is fine now, but thank you for trying! I just have a question as a newbie: is it possible for smite to work on enemy champs? Because my fav LOL YouTuber uses twisted fate a lot and somehow has this blue lightning every few times he attacks and enemy champ. How can I also do this???

Thanks again!

I'm glad yo hear things were fixed after running League as admin! I believe the Item you're referencing is [**Stattik Shiv**](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Statikk_Shiv), but let me know if I was incorrect and I'll figure it out. ^.^
Hi me again, so I learned that the blue lightning thing I was talking about was actually a mastery called thunder lord I think. Can you help me with builds? I'm trying to know how to build Talon

Ah, yeah, Thunderlord's Decree is really good! I'm not very good at playing Assassins, so I may not be very much help, as a support main. I'd say you'd be better off reading through the guides that lots of awesome community members put together each and every patch on many community build sites. There are tons of them out there, some being quick references, while others go into theory crafting and the reasons behind one item over another. I'm sure you can find the right build for your playstyle if you hit up Google! ^.^

Please get back at me if you need help with anything else!
Alright thanks for the help! Just a quick question, do you know any tips on Twisted Fate that I should know?

General TF tips:

Max Q>W>E and R at every opportunity. Lichbane and Ludens Echo are your best friends. Flash ghost/tp for summoners. 

you can double tap w instantly to get the same card as before, if your fast, but the rotation timer starts off from where you last picked, so if you picked yellow before the milisecond it turns blue, your gonna get blue next, however if you pick yellow the second it turns yellow from red, you can get it up to three times... super helpful.

edit: Its a lot of practice... try to get a handle in bots games before and don't be me doing it in ranked.
Wow! I actually tried what you said about the W, and I've gotten more wins than normal! Thanks Dude!
No problem! Glad I could help!

Thanks for jumping in with those pro-tips! As a support main, I don't play TF extremely well and it looks like you covered all the bases! :)

Thanks for all your tips! I you can, you mind adding me to your friends list?
